name: tiles hop
description:
A & D, left & right, or click and drag to maneuver the ball and hop on the tiles

based on the mobile game Tiles Hop

i took the old version i made a few years ago and added audio (sounds from Spitfire Audio's LABS—specifically, the synth pads and music box)

the music is randomly generated by choosing random chords in a major scale every 8 notes; the notes are random notes from a pentatonic scale with a random distribution i chose
